analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#230-231) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#245-252)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#258-264)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#271-276)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#281-291)

CharityProject.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#411-416) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#415)

Reentrancy in CharityProject.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#411-416):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#415)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- withdrawn (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#415-416)

CharityProject.hasStarted (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#420-429) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > openingTime (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#424-429)

CharityProject.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#429-440) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dd6363c7f7a3150fb7ab13c29fe92f5bab23457.sol#436-440)
